title: Going into games and leaving games always results in display flickering and ultimately freezing.
body: This doesn't happen with any other games I play, only with League of Legends. It seems that when ever the game launches (after the pick and ban phase) it sometimes flickers and crashes my display and audio, but it always flickers and crashes when the game exits (when the match finishes), it doesn't happen when I launch the client. The freeze looks is ether black and white stripes or a solid grey screen. This doesn't happen with any other game just League of Legends.

replies.body:
Damn, that sounds crazy to see.  I'm worried you might be experiencing some pretty severe hardware or driver problems.  Try the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help, going over each step to rule out possibilities.

If that doesn't help, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can dig into this with you.

Alright I found a thread which addressed an in game flickering (not the issue I am having), and many people found a resolution for their problem by making their game "windowed" or "borderless". I tried that and I so far haven't had my issue appear again (after playing 2 games), where it happened after every game.
